title: The Great Gatsby
author: By F. Scott Fitzgerald
summary: The Great Gatsby is a 1925 novel by American writer F. Scott Fitzgerald.

title: Little Women
author: By Louisa May Alcott
summary: Little Women is a coming-of-age novel written by American novelist Louisa May Alcott, originally published in two volumes in 1868 and 1869 at the request of her publisher.

title: Not Without Laughter
author: By Langston Hughes
summary: Not Without Laughter portrays African-American life in Kansas in the 1910s, focusing on the effects of class and religion on the community.

title: Rashomon and Seventeen Other Stories
author: By Ryunosuke Akutagawa
